Summer Tab Search improves your browsing experience by replacing your default search engine with its tailored search platform. Search results and advertisements are provided by our trusted partners, ensuring reliable results delivered via HTTP redirects.

By clicking "Add to Chrome," you consent to the installation of the "Summer Tab Search" extension, setting Summer Tab Search as your default search engine in Chrome, and agreeing to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

For additional information, please visit:
- Privacy Policy: https://summertab.com/helps/priv.html
- Terms of Use: https://summertab.com/helps/term.html
- About: https://summertab.com/helps/about.html
- Contact: https://summertab.com/helps/contacts.html
